title: Number Line Estimation and Inhibitory Control Training: Advanced Language Reasoning Enhancement Program Based on Board Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic number concepts, simple numerical operation skills, and awareness of inhibitory control concepts
context.additional_context: A training program combining mathematical reasoning and cognitive control for language-related job competency enhancement, including simple supplementary activities via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can estimate positions on non-standard number lines (364-1,364) with 80% accuracy
Learners can suppress existing strategies by over 70% and apply new strategies in number board games
Learners can improve inhibitory control ability by 20% based on Stroop test standards

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
